We keep the guards fed and clothed so they don't freeze or complain too much. Veterans like me handle supplies since we've learned what kind of gear we'll need. Honestly though, there's another reason I'm here.
So, why are you REALLY here?

I'm here to study a kingdom that once stood in this snowfield. It was a peaceful kingdom, but no one knows why it vanished into history. The survivors scattered, and none of them will talk to me, so I came here myself.

I've heard there's a shrine hidden somewhere in the snowfield kingdom. It was meant only for their kings and queens, to hold their most precious treasure. That means if I can get in there, I'll be rich!
Hey, this is all completely grounded in fact! That's what my gut tells me, anyway. You look like you can handle a little adventure. If you come across the shrine, you gotta let me know!
Welcome, welcome.
Hmm, I must say, I think I've seen you before.
Yeah, we met back in Tria.
Ah! Now I remember you, $MyPCName$! It's been awhile, hasn't it? Good to see you again, very good.
My kingdom... Ahhh, it was so very beautiful. You may hear stories about it, but I tell you the truth.
Our king... I told him to be strong... <font color="#909090">(He does his best to hide his despair, but it runs too deep.)</font>

All you have to do to perform in $map:02000064$ is apply! Just press the request button. If someone else has already applied, you'll need to wait 10 minutes and then apply again when they're done.

It's super easy to perform in a group! So, is there anything else you want to know?

Hmm, maybe you should let me explain first. It all started with a freak waterspout in the middle of the open sea. When the water finally calmed, a new island appeared in its wake.

The palace officially named the land Vanica, but designated it a place for anyone to come and build whatever they want. People started calling it Builder's Park, since they could just build houses and decorate the land with no limits. $MyPCName$, how'd you like to check it out and meet some new friends?

Easy! Just enter this oh-so-convenient portal next to me, and next thing you know you'll be in $map:02000407$, right in the heart of Vanica.
Oh, really? So, you've already built and decorated to your hear's content?
Yep!
Nope!
Wow $MyPCName$, you get around! It really is more fun to build with others than to do it on your own, right? Be sure to head back to Vanica whenever you want to make some new memories together.
Well then, let me explain how to get there! Are you ready? Okay, step one is to enter this portal next to me. That's it! It'll take you straight to $map:02000407$, in the heart of Vanica.
The Secret Knights are watching you.

Welcome to the $map:52000116$. I am $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$. If you have any questions regarding the caravans, feel free to ask.

My job is to make sure $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the other members of the royal family have everything they desire. I'm always busy, but I take pride in my position and my service to $map:02000025$.
These matters are not normally my responsibility, of course, but $npcName:11003165[gender:0]$ asked for me personally due to the... sensitive nature.
Have you been to $map:02000076$? My mother lives there. I really should visit her, but I've been so busy that I haven't had the time since preparations began.
Once my work here is done, I'll go and visit her first thing! I've been sending her letters, it's just... she can't see. A disease took her eyesight. Sigh...

If you've ever been to $map:63000044$, then you know that it was once a peaceful haven. The water was clean and clear, the fish flourished... My beloved hometown...
I'm not sure why, but the water's become muddy and poisonous, and weird fish have started showing up. There was nothing we could do...

Then, a little later, $map:63000044$ erupted into a giant volcano! Some folks thought it was a mermaid's curse, and others claimed that it was a government plot. Personally, I think the volcano was always there, sleeping... Waiting...
Anyway, I can send you to any version of $map:63000044$ that you like. Whether you seek the pristine lake or a sea of molten lava... How can I do that? It's simple.
But it's nearly time for my nap, so I won't go into the details now. Besides, what's the point of life without a bit of mystery?
When it was clean and peaceful, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
When it was mysteriously contaminated, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
When it was covered in hot lava, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!

We're the supporters to commemorate the Infernog Expedition Sortie. Did you bring <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001092$</font>?

$item:30001092$ is a commemorative coin that was created to cheer the expedition. You can obtain it through various activities and use it during the event period as we stay here in $map:02000064$.

You can get $item:30001092$ every day by mail during the event when you log in and when you stay online for 60 min. You also have a chance of getting another one by clearing adventure, raid, and chaos raid dungeons, and from foraging, mining, gathering, and crafting.

Note that you will not be able to obtain an extra Expedition Anniversary Coin from using the <font color="#ffd200">Auto-gathering Voucher</font> or the <font color="#ffd200">Dungeon Reward Booster</font>.
You can exchange $item:30001092$ for items from the Expedition Commemorative Shop run by our supporter. Keep in mind that our shop is open only during the event period!

<font color="#909090">(The lava is eerily silent, but the heat is blistering. There's an inscription on this statue.)</font>
Fifteen hundred years ago, a great earthquake gave birth to this volcano. The nearby forests were destroyed, and in the hot springs gave rise to a new and exotic ecosystem.
The basaltic lava from the volcano influenced the weapons and ceramics used by the local population. But there's more to the lava than precious metals...
<font color="#909090">(There's a story about the birth of the $npcName:22000005$ that lives within the mountain further down in the inscription...)</font>
Long ago, there was a lava eye named Round Eye. It was the runt of its clutch, and all the other lava eyes teased it for its size.

One summer, it dived into the lava river under Hotottot Mountain to try to prove that it was strong, but it was swept away in the lava flow. Rather than help Round Eye out of the river, the other lava eyes mocked their stunted sibling.
Round Eye couldn't take it anymore. It closed its eye and let the lava flow carry it away. "Nobody will miss me," it told itself...
As it drifted away, it prayed that one day it would be reborn as a big, powerful lava eye someday...
Round Eye wasn't seen for a long time after that. Soon, the other lava eyes began to realize that it was gone for good, and there was much fiery weeping at the $map:02000039$.
Then, one day, a gout of lava gushed forth from the mountain, followed by an earth-shattering roar.
The $npcName:22000005$ emerged from the chasm, shocking the rest of the lava eyes. And yet, this monster seemed somehow familiar to them... It was Round Eye!
Overjoyed, the other lava eyes asked it how it had survived. Hahoi, the guardian spirit of the $map:02000039$, had heard Round Eyes' prayer and shown pity.
From that day forth, Round Eye and its fellow lava eyes lived happily on the $map:02000039$, working together to lift each other up.
<font color="#909090">(This fountain is built directly into the $map:02000046$. A steady supply of molten lava gushes from its basin.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This fountain is built directly into the $map:02000046$. A steady supply of molten lava gushes from its basin.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A field journal's been left next to the fountain. It has Silver Wolf's name on it.)
For generations, we believed $map:02000046$ was a natural formation. However, I'm beginning to think otherwise...
While scouting out the area, I noticed that the lava flows in a precise circular path. I scouted out the nearby cave systems, and I can find no source of the lava underground.
This must be the work of powerful magic. If that's the case, then whoever did this must be trying to protect something within the Hourglass.
I still don't know why the lava is circling the mountain, but whatever the reason, I'm sure it's important. And perhaps valuable...
There's a lost temple that was used as a tomb for the great chieftains in ages past. Could this actually be the site of that temple? And how does one get inside...?
<font color="#909090">(This big, beautiful sculpture spans the lake at $map:02000038$. There's a plaque bearing an inscription on top.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This big, beautiful sculpture spans the lake at $map:02000038$. There's a plaque bearing an inscription on top.)</font>

The "Rainbow Bridge" is the final work of Mandy, the genius architect responsible for the design of numerous famous buildings. Its purpose, and the significance of its design may never be known, as construction didn't start until after her death.
The fact that the arch was constructed with such unusual materials—and that it is called a bridge despite functioning more as an obstacle than a pathway—are hallmarks of Mandy's famed eccentricity.
Local legends tell of a portal to a magical land on the shore below the bridge's construction site.
Whether you find this portal or not, we hope you enjoy the beautiful scenery here on the Rainbow Bridge.
Tch! don't tell me I got caught... Your senses are sharp, I'll give you that.
Why are you hiding here?
This place, the $map:02000262$, was created by us, the luditionists. I'm taking a quick peek to ensure everything is running smoothly. And by smoothly, I mean with lots of exciting incidents.
A world without incidents is boring, hmm? We don't want a boring world.
What does a luditionist do?
Hush, now. Don't ask too many questions or you'll get hurt. Let's just say that we're trying to make things more fun.

Are you an angel? I heard a tale that you were born from the goddess of light, but to me, you are the goddess of light!
Can you blame me if I despise F? He is the only one who can be near you. Although I'm just one of many guards right now, one day I will be at your side!
<font color='#909090'>(This could be trouble for the empress...)</font>

Dealing with aches? Pains? Fatigue? Skin blemishes? Then take a soak at these world-renown hot springs! A five minute soak in these naturally heated waters is all you need to feel like a new person!
The people of Perion know that nothing is better after a long day of hunting than a dip on the springs. And best of all, it's free to use!
It's breezy up here!
It's breezy up here!
Huh? What do you want?

You should just wish us happiness, okay?

Even on the darkest night, the great Guardian of Wolfclaw Canyon fought without a hint of fear in his heart.
Oh, brave warrior of Perion! Death is not the end. Though you are no longer in this world, your heart will be with the tribes always.
Woe is me, woe is me...
Woe is me, woe is me...
Oh... Hey! You! Help me!
What's wrong?
Just hear me out, okay? I'm actually a noble from Tria! A mage cursed me to become a frog, until... Well, perhaps you could help me break the curse.
Don't tell me you want me to kiss you.
But it's the only way to break the curse!
Has anyone else tried breaking the curse yet?
Of course. Obviously, I haven't found the right human to break the curse...
Are you really cursed?
That's what my ma used to tell me when I wouldn't eat my flies. The old frog must've taken me in when I was really little.
Ah. Well, I'll pass. Thanks, though.
Don't be so picky. I'll shower you with riches when I'm back in my rightful form! I just know in my guts that you can break this curse.
You keep telling yourself that. I'm out of here.
Where, oh where will I find someone to break my curse? Woe is me!
There's something off about this tree.
<font size='20'>Nope! Just a perfectly normal tree here... Nothing to see. Move along.</font> <font color="#909090">(The tree rustles in a characteristically un-tree-like fashion.)</font>
Oh okay. (Throw a rock at the treetop.)
OW!
Huh. I didn't know trees could scream.
Well obviously I'm not a tree! How did you even spot me? I'm here on a secret mission!
You one of Frey's men?
Did the empress send you?
Liar.
I'm trying to keep a low profile here. Can't you pretend you didn't see me and just move along?
You aren't worthy to even speak of her!
Stop blathering. I'm on duty. Get out of here now, before you regret it.

Ah, it's hot... Even hotter than yesterday...
Ah, it's hot... Even hotter than yesterday...
Another human? Phew. You guys really don't mind this heat?
I'm surprised that you mind it!
Don't laugh! I've got heatstroke. I think. I came up here because it's cooler, and now I can't go back down because it's too hot.
You... do realize you're a fire dog, right?
You think I don't know how weird it is that I hate the heat? Maybe it's because I was born in winter...
I thought you guys needed fire to stay alive.
No, no more fire! I can't go back down there. I gotta shake this heatstroke...
Eating something spicy might take your mind off the heat.
You're just like all those people napping down there. No help. No help at all...
Uh... Um...
Uh... Um...
Okay, I'm just gonna do it. I'm going to ask. Hey, human! Tell me something...
What do you need to know?
What am I? I mean, what do you think I'm gonna be when I grow up?
What do you mean?
Am I gonna be a moth? A butterfly? Maybe a beetle?
You're a beetle, for sure.
Oh, you're definitely a moth.
Hmm. Maybe a butterfly?
R-really? I guess beetles are pretty cool...
Wow... A moth? So the butterflies were telling the truth... I might as well just end it now. Sniff...
That's a relief! The butterflies said I was a moth, but I want to become a beautiful butterfly!
I will too grow up to be a butterfly!
Look at that dumb wormy-worm!
Look at that dumb wormy-worm!
You see that fat little bug over there? Do you think he can become a butterfly?
Sure, why not?
No way. Never.
Pssh! You think that's how a real caterpillar looks? You must have a tiny brain.
Yeah, exactly. Yet that poor creature actually think it's gonna be a butterfly. Can you believe that?
<font color="#909090">(Pressing your ear to the door, you hear some Blackstar gangsters talking.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Pressing your ear to the door, you hear some Blackstar gangsters talking.)</font>
<font color="#f45342">The big party's tomorrow. You get that cake for Haren yet?</font>
<font color="#41f441">I'm workin' on it! That bakery ya sent me to ain't exactly quick. You know they take orders years in advance?</font>
<font color="#41f441">Wait a sec. This is for Haren? I told 'em to put Min's name on the cake!</font>
You what?! Chen's gonna smash my head in when he sees we messed up Min's birthday bash!
<font color="#909090">(A teeny-tiny scribble written so small, it almost appears to be shy.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A teeny-tiny scribble written so small, it almost appears to be shy.)</font>
$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s secret, exposed! She actually has a boyfriend! We've been betrayed!
<font color="#909090">(Is the person who wrote this... angry? $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s fans can be scary sometimes...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Wait. There's another note written here!)</font>
Interesting rumor. If you happen to meet my boyfriend, bring him to me. I want to know what he looks like. - $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$
Rain, rain, go away. Go away forever.
Rain, rain, go away. Go away forever.
Oh, a passing adventurer. Why don't you take a break and chat with me?
Okay. Know any stories?
Well, I can tell you your story, if you like. You've been pushing forward without rest. But do you really know where you're going?
What do you mean?
I've been here for over a century. I know many things, including things about you. What would you like to know?
Tell me about my future.
Will I ever find true love?
How did Maple World come to be?
I tell you I know things, and you assume I'm a darned prophet. Ha! Okay, I'll play along. I see much potential in you, my friend. Your future holds many great things.
And what would I know about love? I've been alone my entire life...
Uhh...
Why are you asking me? Didn't someone fill you in when you first started your adventure? Something about two goddesses and the birth of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.
I think I remember that.
Live long enough, and you begin to lose perspective on good and evil—right and wrong. The hero of yesterday can become the villain of tomorrow.
I can't say whether the future will be good or bad, but now... for now, you are magnificent.

I like to think that everything will work out for people who live their lives with conviction and purpose. You may not believe me now, but someday you'll think back on this old turtle's words and understand.
That's not to say I've never been in love. There was someone in my life... but she passed away in an accident. I never mustered up the courage to tell her how I felt...
Sorry. I didn't mean to stir up bad memories.
Oh, it's all in the past now. Perhaps, when I leave behind this mortal coil, I'll see her again. It's something that gives me hope, anyway.
I'm sure you'll see her again.

That's kind of you to say. If I were to give you any advice, it would be this—don't follow in my footsteps. When you find someone you love, tell them how you feel. Don't live your whole life wondering what could have been...
The goddess of light may be gone, but the remnants of her power permeate this world. It is up to you to help the empress carry that blessed light on into the future.
How'd you know I'm helping the empress?
Oh, you don't get to my age without learning how to keep your ears open.
<font color="#909090">(This workbench is particularly cluttered.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This workbench is particularly cluttered.)</font>

<font color="#909090">(Many weapon parts are scattered across the top of the bench. Everything on it is coated with a fine layer of onyx dust. It appears Ophelia's skill is the result of countless hours of practice.)</font>
(On the corner of the workbench, there's a fancy business card that seems out of place. "Unload Your Unused Trash! Ophelia's Hardware Store! We Buy All Scrap Metal. Call Us! 902-555-3959")
<font color='#909090'>(Is the enchanting business not working out? What a strange turn of events...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You faintly make out the cries of a woman. She somehow sounds far away and close at the same time.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You faintly make out the cries of a woman. She somehow sounds far away and close at the same time.)</font>
My child... My child... Where are you...?
Come back to me... Come out of the cold... Your mama is waiting...
Sigh... Will I ever get to leave this house again?
Sigh... Will I ever get to leave this house again?
I don't dare set foot outside!
They can't hang around here forever... can they?
Hm... The schedule's tight, but we should be able to finish sector B today.
Hm... The schedule's tight, but we should be able to finish sector B today.
Ah, a new face. What do you want?
What are you building here?
Ah, I see you've got an inquisitive mind. Good. I like it!
We're building a geothermal plant here. Just you wait. In a few years' time, we'll be providing all the power to the nearby towns!
The old... erm, tenants used this place to build a smelting furnace, but they didn't have the know-how to handle this much heat.
Anyway, since this place is basically abandoned, we decided to take things over. If you want to lend a hand, we can always use another strong back or two!
Shh! You'll wake up the other fireflies. No loud noises allowed.
Shh! You'll wake up the other fireflies. No loud noises allowed.
Quietly, now... You're here looking for a quiet place to rest, aren't you?
What makes you think that?
Humans always come here when something's on their mind. Our pretty light helps them feel better! I figured you might be the same.
I can't do a danged thing to actually help you. But hey, if staring at our sparkly heinies brings you peace, then stare away!
<font color="#909090">(This enchanted marker has been warded against the ages. Ancient writing has been etched into it.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This enchanted marker has been warded against the ages. Ancient writing has been etched into it.)</font>
When our world was young, the goddess of light faded away. It became the responsibility of us fairfolk to carry what remained of her work into the future.
The taint of the darkness remained. Without our goddess, it fell to us to seal it away.
Someday, we believe that our goddess will return to us in mortal form. Until then, we wait and stand watch against the shadows.
Ribbit ribbit...
Ribbit ribbit...
Ribbit ribbit... Here we go again... Ribbit ribbit!
Ribbit ribbit!
Ribbit ribbit!
Ribbit ribbit! I might be under a spell, too!
A cold and rainy day, like when we met. His eyes, his love, I never will forget...
A cold and rainy day, like when we met. His eyes, his love, I never will forget...
I see a wand'rer, hail! Be welcome here. This is Ellosylva, the Fairy's Tear.
That's a sad name.
We fairies oft wear smiles bright and hale, but in this rain, I share my pain, my tale.
And what's your tale?
A human's heart I held in hand, and mine in his. But human lives are short and I was left behind when it came to be his time.
Once a fairy falls in love, she never forgets her lover, even after they've gone to the place where we cannot follow...
I broke the rules and fell in love. I first met him here in $map:02000042$. It still smells like him...
We were happy together, but it couldn't last. And now, I can never see him again...
He told me that my song made him think of the rain. That is why I sing here—to remember him. But, no matter how cheerfully I try to sing, it always comes out sad...
It's a beautiful song.
Thank you, traveler. I like to think that he's out there, somewhere, still listening to me. Come see me again whenever you want to hear me sing.
Ah... Peace at last...
Ah... Peace at last...
Hello. Have you come here to rest, too?
I sure have.
I see... It's quiet here, isn't it? I love it. All of the hustle and bustle of city life just melts away...
Sounds like you've had a long day.
Everyone has their challenges in life, no? I love my job, but sometimes it gets to me.
I hear you.
I'll be here for a little while longer, just soaking in the scents of the forest. I'm going to get plenty of rest before I go back.
Enjoy yourself!
You, too! I bet you could use the break even more than I could. Everybody needs some rest now and then.
<font color='#909090'>(This giant snowflake reflects the brilliant sun. No matter how brightly it shines, it never seems to melt.)</font>
<font color='#909090'>(This giant snowflake reflects the brilliant sun. No matter how brightly it shines, it never seems to melt.)</font>

<font color='#909090'>(Tourists come from all over the world to see the local "Santa" who makes presents for good boys and girls. Taking your picture in front of the snow crystal is a trendy thing to do.)</font>
<font color='#909090'>(They say that the snow crystal is a reflection of the goodness and kindness that lives in the hearts of Santas everywhere.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This mascot is the unofficial guardian of $map:02000377$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This mascot is the unofficial guardian of $map:02000377$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The local fishermen consider this whale lucky. They say that you'll catch a huge fish if you kiss the whale's cheek before heading out.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's also lucky for the villagers. If you have a dream about this whale, buy a lottery ticket the next day and you'll surely win. At least, that's what they tell you.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Some people assume that this whale's name is Coco, given the name of the island. However, the creator of the whale insists that it isn't true.)</font>
You got any Mushking Coins?
The king himself told us to open our shops to you. Aren't you lucky?
Can't wait to unload all this junk and get back to $map:82000006$...
Yaaaawn! What're you jabbering about?
Yaaaawn! What're you jabbering about?
The king said go, so I went. But I'm so sleepy...
The king said go, so I went. But I'm so sleepy...
What do I look like, an item dispenser? Go bug the big mushroom next to me if you got Mushking Coins to spend.
What do I look like, an item dispenser? Go bug the big mushroom next to me if you got Mushking Coins to spend.
Zzzz!
Zzzz!
<font color="#909090">(This chocolate waterfall puts off an overwhelmingly sweet aroma.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This chocolate waterfall puts off an overwhelmingly sweet aroma.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The rich chocolate of this waterfall is enough to drive some children sugar-crazy.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The chocolate found in $map:02000257$ is favored by dessert chefs everywhere. Some say it's even Empress $npcName:11001969[gender:1]$'s favorite chocolate.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(In fact, rumor has it the empire's vaults are full of the stuff...)</font>

Woo! I feel different!
I'm happy because I'm full!
Ugh, I feel so bloated.
Ah! I'm so full!
Thank you for raising me well! Here is a gift from my heart!
Wow! That was fun!
Whee! Let's play again!
Playtime is the best!
Ugh. So hungry...
Are you putting me on a diet? Hurry and FEEED MEEEE.
That's my secret, I'm always hungry.
Yummy!
Rainbow is my favorite flavor!
Food is happiness.
Woo! I feel different!
I'm happy because I'm full!
Ugh, I feel so bloated.

SCRIPTNPCNAM_0702163207010386_NAME
SCRIPTNPCNAM_0702163207010387_NAME
How may I help you?

It is all well and good to forget one's troubles in a cheerful place such as this, but we cannot lose sight of what's real. A dark storm gathers over Maple World. Now more than ever, we need heroes. Will you answer the call?
Maple World needs heroes.
The world beyond this park is full of wonders. You should see it for yourself.
What is it?
Sometimes I wish I wasn't so amazing at everything...
Think you have what it takes to be a hero?
What is it?
I wish he wore glasses. He's so intelligent and sensitive... It would be perfect...
I came to see the prof—erm, I mean, to recruit heroes!
The professor is so handsome...
Wow!
My favorite game is hide-and-seek!
Hahaha!
$npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ likes to frighten us with scary stories, but now that I know better, I don't believe a word he says!
Wanna split a nice glass of milk?
Hey $male:mister,female:lady$, want to play hide-and-seek?
Wait!
An all-expenses paid trip to Mushtopia? Count me in! I feel like dancing!
Welcome to $map:02000499$.
Have a great day!
Mm? Are you here to see little old me?
Hello! It's another beautiful day in Royale Park, wouldn't you say?
Welcome!
$map:02000499$ is so exciting!
What do you want?
This place is gonna make me rich! I've just gotta figure out how, first...
Heehee... This place is going to make me a lot of money.
Go away, you bother me.
How may I help you?
Ever since we were little, it's always been me, $npcName:11004149$ and the sea, hehe!
The sea is my home.
Hm hm hmmm, hm! Those marching songs always get stuck in my head.

I've loved $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$'s books and the sea ever since I was a boy—probably a side-effect of growing up by the ocean. And now I'm on a voyage of my own, alongside my childhood friends.
Adventure ho!
What is it?
Are you here to participate in Mushking Royale too? I'm afraid we've already got a squad of four. I'll see you on the battlefield!
I can do anything if I'm near the sea!
How may I help you?
$npcName:11004150$, $npcName:11004148$, $npcName:11004149$, and I are here in $map:02000499$ on vacation! Since we all grew up together, we've got some real synergy on the battlefield.
Can I help you?
The scenery here is breathtaking, but if you want the best view in $map:02000499$, you should try hanging from $npcName:11004165$.
Hang onto $npcName:11004165$ for an aerial tour of $map:02000499$!
To ride $npcName:11004165$, you'll have to watch for your chance and grab on quick!
What seems to be the problem?
There are chests hidden all over Maple World, but the ones in $map:02000499$ are... different. Hehe, you'll see!
You're almost at the top, don't quit now!
Hello.
Wow, just look at that ocean! This place is so different from $map:02000051$. It really is nice to get out and explore the world once in a while.
You can fly around on $npcName:11004165$ if you climb to the top of the overlook behind me.
Ugh!
Ugh! I'm all stiff from standing around all day. I can't wait to get off work.
If you want to train for Mushking Royale, do it here!
Wahhh...
Yawn... Boooring. I think I liked working in $map:82000000$ better, even with the occasional beatings.
Yaaaawn... this is the practice area...
Meow!
Nom nom nom nom! <font color="#909090">(He flops his ears joyfully.)</font>
It's so close, but I can't reach it. It comes to me in the night and vanishes at dawn.
Many things shine, not all of them valuable.
So many shiny things...
But it's all just a facade.
Is there something I can help you with?
The Royal Guard protects the Empress and all of $map:02000001$. That is why we must never allow our skills to dull. So long as there are threats to peace in this world, we will not rest.
It's time to commence our training!
A true guardsman never stops training.
Ah... What should I do?
Ohh gee, oh man... I don't know about this royale thing.
What? Here?
This is all safe, r-right?
What seems to be the problem?
Guarding the armory is important work, but I'm glad Captain $npcName:11000119$ asked me to tag along.
Are you on duty?
At your command!
Actually, I'm on leave at the moment. The captain asked me to be in his squad for Mushking Royale!
What is it?
It's been too long since we've been together like this. Time to warm up!
Let's warm up!
I'm feeling a bit under the weather, so I'm warming up with a little cardio.
Order now or get a face full of burning oil. Your choice.
Don't get the wrong idea. I'm not here selling churros because my restaurant is doing poorly, I'm just here to enjoy myself.
So then why ARE you selling churros?
Can I have a churro?
Huh? Because I like to cook, obviously.
Well... If I'm being honest, we all trekked all the way here to $map:02000499$ to take a vacation, but we ran out of money to pay for lodging.
They're not done yet. Come back later.
Churros... How pedestrian...
Ugh...
Blam, blam! Oh, hey. I'm just practicing my aim. I don't want to let my squad down.
I've really got to practice...
Ugh...
Mm?
Sorry, I've already got a squad. See? There's the guy selling churros, the girl strutting around over there, and that guy shooting finger-guns. I couldn't ask for better teammates.
You don't have to look twice. I'm who you think I am.
You're lucky to have run into me. I'm not sticking around, I've just popped in for a photo shoot. I can't really have a relaxing vacation with so many frenzied fans around.
Sigh... Fame is a burden.
I guess I'm too handsome for my own good.
Today is the best day of my life!!
Eek! It's $npcName:11004174[gender:0]$! It's really $npcName:11004174[gender:0]$!! I can't believe it, I think I'm gonna die.
Eeeeeeee! He's so handsome!
It's good to see you.
When things get dicey, it's good to have somebody who's got your back.
Yes? How may I help you?
You want to join our squad? Listen, you seem nice, but I've already got two reliable partners. I don't think we need anyone else.
The three of us are more than enough!
Do you need something?
If we want to win the next match, the two of you need to be more pragmatic.
What is it?
My greatest joy is seeing my daughter smile. I would have visited this place sooner if I had known it would make $npcName:11004180[gender:1]$ would so happy.
How may I help you?
Hahahaha!
Hahahaha!
What do you want?
None of this makes any sense.
What is it?
Simply hiding is no strategy for victory. Especially up against the likes of an expert tracker like Arazaad.
We can win this if we just remember Arazaad's teachings.
This is our chance to show what we're made of.
Life is such a chore.
Arazaad, Arazaad, Arazaad. Hmph. $npcName:11004182[gender:0]$'s always going on and on about the old man.
Do you need something?
It's certainly reassuring to have these two at my side, but we have a lot of work ahead of us if we intend to come out on top.
Can I help you?
To reclaim all I have lost, I must find a champion in the greatest of games!
Ah... N-nice to meet you...
I came here to get t-t-tougher, so I can chase off the w-wolves plaguing our farm.
Hm...
Ah, so plush and comfy!
I like soft things.
I'm so FLUFFY!
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
You must always believe in yourself. Though the road is long and difficult, it is our duty to bring peace to this world.
This place is one of splendor.
Perhaps we should decorate $map:02000001$ like this? Hehe.
How may I help you?
The world relies on the strength of heroes like you. May the empress's blessing be with you.
Oh no...
Is this a trial from the heavens?
Do you need something?
I'm wise enough to admit I've gotten too old to keep up with the youth of today. When you reach a certain age, you've just got to step out of the way and leave things to the next generation.
Stop and chat awhile.
May I help you?

Our yearly pilgrimage through the Vayar Mountains has made the warriors of Murpagoth mighty. Perhaps you will join us on our next journey? That is of course, after we have proven ourselves on the fields of Mushtopia.
Feel the heat!
Can I help you?
I'm delighted to be visiting $map:02000499$ with my mother. Of course, I won't be engaging in the tourney myself. Mother and I will be quite happy to cheer the contestants on from the sidelines.
I'm happy I brought Mother here.
What is it?
My son is always thinking of me, and it makes me so very happy. He's such a good boy! I don't know how I'd get along without him.
This place is so very lovely. I'm so glad my son brought me.
Hello.
Out of the way, buddy, you're in my shot.
When I post these pics online, my friends will be so jealous!
Hello.
Y'know, I wasn't so sure about those mushfolk when I got the brochure, but I've gotta say this place is pretty great!
Now this is one classy theme park!
It's a pleasure.
It's a bit hot out here, but spectating is such fun!
It's so hot...
What is it?
Are you looking for friends, too?
What is it?
The mush before you is merely a facsimile of his mushyness. The real $npc:11004213[gender:1]$ is actually luxuriating inside the castle.
A facsimile?
Fake. A fraud. A phony. See the way he bounces around? It's really just an inflatable balloon rigged up to make noises.
That's a pretty lifelike balloon.
I know, right? You can touch him, if you want. Just don't pop him. These things are expensive.
What is it?

Hmm? Is that really the $npc:11004213[gender:0]$, you ask? Yep! Except this one is bigger. Otherwise, they're identical in every way! The real $npc:11004213[gender:0]$ is full of hot air, too, heh heh heh!
Yaaaaaawn...
You want to try out some high-caliber mushsplosives? Just pick up a bomb and throw it.
Right... And how do I pick stuff up again?
You don't know? Just stand next to a bomb and the words "Pick Up" will pop up in the air as if by magic. Just press the corresponding button and you're ready to unleash the cleansing power of fire!
...None of that seems strange to you?
No stranger than the voices in my head that tell me to burn things!
Yaaaawn!
Yaaawn...
♬I wanna be where the mushfolk are. I wanna see—wanna see 'em mushin'. Bouncin' around on those stalks!♬
Yaaawn!
What is it?
It's my goal in life to one day be as shroomy as the $npcName:11004213[gender:0]$. Or failing that, at least to mush it up with the best of them.
I want to be a shroomy mushroom, know what I mean?
Do you have business with me?
Haha, let's get this party started! Pew pew! That's the sound of me blowing everyone away with the power of my cannon!
If you want to be happy, there's one rule to live by: figure out what you wanna do, and do it! In my case, that's listening my cannon purr as it pumps out hundreds of rounds a minute.
Bada-dada-da-da-da!
They're so lucky I can't use my cannon in the royale.
What's up?
This world is ruled by competition. Only the best win.
If you wanna survive, you've got to win, and there's no right or wrong when it comes to winning. Somebody's got to go, you or them.
If you want to win, you've got to be ready to do ANYTHING.
Was there something you needed?
There is power in anger, but you must never lose yourself in the heat of battle. When all that's left is devastation, there are no winners.
Powerful, decisive action is the key to victory.
Can't talk. Important mission.
Sorry, I don't have time for games... I'm here on a special mission. My partner said to meet him at the tables on the dock over by the balloons, but he's nowhere in sight.
What could be keeping $npc:11004221[gender:0]$?
